definition: A protein that signals the presence of unfolded proteins in the endoplasmic reticulum (ER) or other ER-related stress.
selection_criteria: it signals the presence of unfolded proteins in the endoplasmic reticulum (ER) or other ER-related stress
referents: Cyclic AMP-dependent transcription factor ATF-4 (ATF4 aka CREB2, TXREB)
Class A basic helix-loop-helix protein 15 (BHLHA15 aka BHLHB8, MIST1)
X-box-binding protein 1 (XBP1 aka TREB5, XBP2)
Derlin-3 (DERL3 aka C22orf14, DER3, LLN2)
CDK5 regulatory subunit-associated protein 3 (CDK5RAP3 aka IC53, LZAP, MSTP016, OK/SW-cl.114, PP1553)
Eukaryotic translation initiation factor 2-alpha kinase 3 (EIF2AK3 aka PEK, PERK)
E3 ubiquitin-protein ligase AMFR (AMFR aka RNF45)
Eukaryotic translation initiation factor 2 subunit 1 (EIF2S1 aka EIF2A)
Ubiquitin thioesterase OTU1 (YOD1 aka DUBA8, HIN7, OTUD2, PRO0907)
Cyclic AMP-responsive element-binding protein 3 (CREB3 aka LZIP)
DNA damage-inducible transcript 3 protein (DDIT3 aka CHOP, CHOP10, GADD153)
Serine/threonine-protein kinase/endoribonuclease IRE1 (ERN1 aka IRE1)
Tyrosine-protein phosphatase non-receptor type 1 (PTPN1 aka PTP1B)
Transitional endoplasmic reticulum ATPase (VCP aka HEL-220, HEL-S-70)
Derlin-2 (DERL2 aka DER2, FLANA, CGI-101, SBBI53)
Selenoprotein S (SELENOS aka SELS, VIMP, AD-015, SBBI8)
Cystathionine gamma-lyase (CTH)
Derlin-1 (DERL1 aka DER1, UNQ243/PRO276)
Ankyrin repeat and SOCS box protein 11 (ASB11)
Protein mono-ADP-ribosyltransferase PARP16 (PARP16 aka ARTD15, C15orf30)
Cyclic AMP-responsive element-binding protein 3-like protein 1 (CREB3L1 aka OASIS, PSEC0238)
Vesicle-associated membrane protein-associated protein B/C (VAPB aka UNQ484/PRO983)
RING-box protein 2 (RNF7 aka RBX2, ROC2, SAG)
Transcriptional regulator QRICH1
Putative RNA polymerase II subunit B1 CTD phosphatase RPAP2 (RPAP2 aka C1orf82)
